name: Fishing Flip - Game For Kids
description:
Fishing flip game for kids is an insanely addictive casual game ! You’ll be able to have a deep-ocean experience catching magnificent species of fish and creatures in an eco-friendly way! The game features stunning deep-sea graphics, music, sound for a more enjoyable and pleasant experience. Aim and shoot with your cannon to catch fish and earn a large amount of Golds!

Simply tap the screen to aim and catch sea creatures, including hammerhead sharks, sting rays, jellyfish, pufferfish, clownfish, anglerfish, sea turtles, and more.

It’s easy and fun!

You can buy more golds to earn more coins and compete with many players in the world through the leaderboard.
